question: Which state has signed a MoU with IT giant Hewlett Packard to provide tele-medicine facilities in the remote areas of the state?
explanation: Uttarakhand government has signed an MoU with IT giant Hewlett Packard to provide tele-medicine facilities in the remote areas of the state. The company will create tele-medicine facilities at four Community Health Centres under the MoU signed in the presence of Chief Minister Trivendra Singh Rawat. The MoU is part of the state government's ongoing efforts to boost health facilities in the hills.
